edu.cpp.cs.cs141.final_prog_assgment

Class GameEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cpp.cs.cs141.final_prog_assgment.GameEngine

  • public class GameEngine
extends java.lang.Object
    This Class Handles all Logic of the Game. And Executes the game actions. Creates the UI as well as the GameBoard, and gives them directions.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.lang.String[] board
      Holds Array of ALL Tokens
      private boolean debug
      Decides if the Map is completely revealed to the user.

      Stores all Game Data for Serialization
      private boolean gameOver
      Tells if a Winner has been Decided victory Decides who won

      Decides if Enemy AI is enabled
      private boolean invincibility
      If a player is invincible they can't be stabbed by ninjas.
      private int numberOfNinjas
      Keeps track of how many ninjas are on the board (Should be between 4 and 6)
      private Player player
      Allows us to set the player's life total and ammo.
      private int playerLoc
      Stores location of Player inside of single array Matrix in GameBoard
      private boolean radar
      If true, the user can see the location of the briefcase.

      Initializes Private Variables to default values
      private boolean saved
      If the player saved this "turn"
      private static java.lang.String savePath
      Path to Save Directory, System Independent by use of getProperty()
      private int turnCount
      Keeps track of turn count (invincibility lasts five turns)
      private UserInterface ui
      Displays information to the User/Get input from user
      private boolean victory
      Tells who won the game.

        1. Display Turn Options 2. return Result 3. Execute Action

      • executeEnemyTurn

        public void executeEnemyTurn()
        First Check if any Ninja is adjacent to Player, and then stabs Then move all Ninjas to a new Possible Location Then increment turnCount game

      • attemptNinjaStab

        public boolean attemptNinjaStab()
        For all Remaining Alive ninjas, checks surrounding coordinates and if player exists, stab
        Returns:
        if ninjas stabbed player

      • shootInDirection

        public boolean shootInDirection(char direction)
        1. Verify if Player object can shoot 2. Remove Ammo 3. Check if spaces in the given direction are shared with ninjas or are blocked by rooms. 4. If Ninja is found, remove from array, and immediately return true 6. Otherwise, return false
        Parameters:
        direction - shot in
        Returns:
        if a single ninja was removed from game

      • giveEffect

        public void giveEffect()
        Carry out the action of a Item Suitcase means Game won Radar = Reveals location of Briefcase Invincibility = Player can not be Stabbed for 5 FULL turns

      • checkForItems

        public boolean checkForItems()
        Returns:
        if there is a item where the player is

      • randomEnemyMove

        public void randomEnemyMove()
        For Each Enemy, random move.

      • smartEnemyMove

        public void smartEnemyMove()
        Moves the ninja towards the player if the player happens to be in the same row or column as them AND they isn't a room in between them.

      • singleRandomEnemyMove

        public int singleRandomEnemyMove(int location)
        Moves only one ninja randomly. Used for the AI when the ninja can't see the player
        Parameters:
        location - location of ninja to move
        Returns:
        the new location
